description: The method `release_floating_ip` is what the method is called in the api, not the manager.  The function name needs updating to `deallocate_floating_ip` in the network manager layer.
title: Disassociating and auto_assigned floating address fails

comments.content: The method `release_floating_ip` is what the method is called in the api, not the manager.  The function name needs updating to `deallocate_floating_ip` in the network manager layer.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~xtoddx

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/3148
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/6bb8944112f07c3328186f4d2c53c3661d165f9d
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 6bb8944112f07c3328186f4d2c53c3661d165f9d
Author: Todd Willey <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Jan 18 14:27:09 2012 -0500

    Fix disassociating of auto assigned floating ips.
    
    Also makes adds passing True to the disassociate/deallocate functions
    use a kwarg so the meaning is more apparent.
    
    Fixes bug #918358.
    
    Change-Id: Ie88d19456ffe0fa5f7c7bba79b572672db96c766
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
